segments.text: Oh , damn . There ’ s another traffic jam on the highway .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can there be a traffic jam on a 16 - lane highway every day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are just too many people , and too many cars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder if there was an accident .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they just said it too many people were trying to get off at the Capitol exits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , let ’ s put on some music . We ’ re going to be stuck in this for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , what do you want to listen to ?
segments.speaker: S1
